product_overview: Runhouse Hat Customizer is a web-based design tool that allows users to personalize hats by uploading images, adding texts, and positioning design layers on a virtual hat canvas. It includes an administrative dashboard to manage product configurations, pricing, and assets, as well as user dashboards to track order status and galleries for showcasing designs and reviews.
core_goals: Enable end users to fully customize hats through an intuitive drag-and-drop design studio.
Provide robust product and pricing management capabilities for administrators.
Support multiple languages and ensure mobile responsiveness for broad accessibility.
Maintain synchronization between design elements and product configurations such as colors and sizes.
Ensure high usability with real-time updates and validations on pricing, design layering, and safe printing zones.
key_features: Design Studio with drag-and-drop image and text layering on a hat canvas including layer management and product configuration sidebar.
Admin Dashboard for managing product pricing, hat assets, color options, and print zone definitions with authentication.
User Dashboard for users to view and track their order statuses.
Gallery to showcase design examples and user reviews.
Internationalization support allowing language toggling and live interface text updates.
Mobile responsive layout adapting canvas and sidebar for smaller screens with touch interaction support.
user_flow_summary: User visits the Design Studio and uploads images or adds text to the hat canvas.
User drags, resizes, and layers images and text independently on the hat canvas within safe printing zones.
User selects hat color, size, and quantity using the product sidebar; price updates dynamically including bulk discounts.
User logs into Admin Dashboard to manage product configurations such as base price, hat images, and safe zone dimensions.
User switches application language via language toggle, affecting all UI text.
User accesses User Dashboard to view order status after placing an order.
User accesses Gallery to browse examples and reviews of customized hats.
validation_criteria: The drag-and-drop and resizing of images and text operate smoothly with no glitches.
All layers are independently selectable, editable, and removable with consistent updates across canvas and layers panel.
Product configurations including pricing, hat color and size selections update dynamically and persist after changes in Admin Dashboard.
Safe zone overlays reflect admin changes and properly clip design elements without loss of visibility.
Language toggling updates UI text without missing translation keys or console errors.
The interface is fully responsive on mobile devices, with appropriate canvas scaling, sidebar stacking, and touch support for draggable elements.
Authentication protects Admin Dashboard with appropriate redirects.
Price calculations including bulk discounts update accurately as quantities change.
